channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform

item.title: CVE-2017-12189|2024-08-05T18:28:16.689Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- red%20hat%20jboss%20enterprise%20application%20platform
item.description: It was discovered that the jboss init script as used in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 7.0.7.GA performed unsafe file handling which could result in local privilege escalation. This issue is a result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-8656.
